title: Domain 5.2: Given a scenario, troubleshoot problems related to motherboards, RAM, CPU, and power.
content:
🧠 5.2 – Common Symptoms and What They Indicate

🔊 POST Beeps

Beep patterns identify hardware issues (RAM, CPU, GPU). Refer to motherboard manual.

💥 Crash Screens

BSOD (Windows): Fatal system error
Pinwheel (macOS): App unresponsive

🧠 Likely causes: RAM, overheating, bad drivers

🖥️ Black Screen

  • Check cables/display
  • Check GPU or unseated RAM/CPU

⚡ No Power

  • Dead PSU
  • Loose cable
  • Bad motherboard

🐢 Sluggish Performance

  • Overheating
  • Insufficient RAM
  • Too many background apps

🌡️ Overheating

  • Random shutdowns or lag
  • Check fans, airflow, thermal paste

🔥 Burning Smell

Shut down immediately. Could be PSU or motherboard capacitor failure. Fire risk!

🔁 Intermittent Shutdown

  • Failing PSU
  • Overheating
  • Motherboard short

💻 Application Crashes

  • RAM errors
  • Software bugs
  • Overclocking issues

🌀 Grinding Noise

Failing fan or hard drive. Needs immediate replacement.

💣 Capacitor Swelling

Bulging or leaking capacitors on motherboard = replace the board

🕒 Inaccurate Date/Time

CMOS battery is dying. Replace it to retain BIOS settings.

💡 Exam Tip:

Memorize symptom → cause patterns for troubleshooting scenarios!
